data.title: Courteney Cox (Actress)
data.meta_description: Best known for her roles as Monica Geller on the NBC sitcom "Friends" Cox became a household name in the 1990s. She later also starred as Gale Weathers in...
data.text:
Profession: Actress

Biography: Best known for her roles as Monica Geller on the NBC sitcom "Friends" Cox became a household name in the 1990s.

She later also starred as Gale Weathers in the horror series "Scream", and as Jules Cobb in the ABC/TBS sitcom "Cougar Town", for which she earned her first Golden Globe nomination.

Born: June 15, 1964

Birthplace: Birmingham, Alabama, USA

Age: 60 years old

Generation: Baby Boomer

Chinese Zodiac: Dragon

Star Sign: Gemini

Acting Career

"Friends" TV sitcom created by David Crane and Marta Kauffman debuts on NBC, starring Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc, Matthew Perry and David Schwimmer

Horror film classic "Scream", starring Neve Campbell and Courteney Cox, is released

54th Emmy Awards: The West Wing, Friends, Michael Chiklis and Allison Janney win

TV sitcom "Friends" airs season finale in 10th and final season in US (52.5 million viewers)

"Friends" reunion screens, 17 years after the TV sitcom series ended

Personal Life

Actor and film director David Arquette (27) weds "Friends" actress Courteney Cox (34) at Grace Cathedral in San Francisco, California

Actress Courteney Cox and actor David Arquette divorce after 13 years of marriage

Famous Actresses
